programme.title: Stoke vs Middlesbrough - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Stoke have only enjoyed three wins in their last 15 league meetings with Middlesbrough, winning none of their last three against Boro. After their 3-1 win last season, Middlesbrough could win back-to-back league visits to Stoke for only the second time in their history, previously doing so in March 1956.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Olympique de Marseille vs Liverpool - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Marseille have lost their last three UEFA Champions League games against Liverpool, most recently in the 2008-09 group stage. programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Levante - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20 - Mini Match
programme.desc: After a run of nine consecutive wins against Levante in LaLiga between 2012 and 2016, Real Madrid have only won five of their last 11 meetings against them in the competition. Levante have taken points in three of their last five away games against Real Madrid in LaLiga, after losing 10 of their first 11 visits to the Santiago Bernabéu in the competition.

programme.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs A.F.C. Bournemouth - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Brighton have lost just one of their six Premier League home games against Bournemouth, winning the last four in a row since a 5-0 defeat in April 2019. Following their 2-1 win at the Vitality Stadium in September, Bournemouth are looking to complete just their second Premier League double over Brighton after 2018-19.

programme.desc: The 35th edition of the Africa Cup of Nations will take place in Morocco from the 21st of December 2025 through until 18th January 2026. All matches from AFCON are live and exclusive only on beIN.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.desc: which will host the FIFA World Cup 2026, its cultural, grassroots and community dimensions of football

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Following their 3-0 win at the London Stadium in September, Tottenham are looking to complete the league double over West Ham for the first time since 2019-20. West Ham have won just one of their last eight league games against Spurs, beating them 2-1 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in December 2023.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.title: PSG vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 18
programme.desc: Paris SG have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 11 matches against Lille in all competitions, with their last clean sheet coming in March 2021 in the Coupe de France. Paris SG have won 10 of their last 11 home matches against Lille in all competitions, the only exception being a defeat in April 2021 in Ligue 1.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Club Brugge - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Kairat and Club Brugge – indeed, it will be the first major European match ever played between sides from Kazakhstan and Belgium. Only one non-qualifying European fixture has ever been played between teams from Kazakhstan and Belgium, with Tobol Kostanay beating K. Sint-Truidense VV 3-0 over two legs in the UEFA Intertoto Cup in 2003.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. Real Madrid have only lost one of their 18 home games against French sides in major European competition and are unbeaten in 14 since that lone defeat versus Paris SG in March 1994.

programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. programme.title: Manchester United vs. Manchester City - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs. Arsenal - English Premier League 2026/2027
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. programme.title: Brighton & Hove Albion vs A.F.C. Bournemouth - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22
programme.desc: Brighton have lost just one of their six Premier League home games against Bournemouth, winning the last four in a row since a 5-0 defeat in April 2019. Following their 2-1 win at the Vitality Stadium in September, Bournemouth are looking to complete just their second Premier League double over Brighton after 2018-19.

programme.title: Real Sociedad vs Barcelona - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Real Sociedad have won two of their last six LaLiga matches against FC Barcelona, having secured only one victory in their previous 16 encounters against the Catalan side in the competition. Barcelona have picked up points in eight of their last nine away games against Real Sociedad in LaLiga, losing the most recent one 1-0 in November 2024. The Blaugrana have not suffered two consecutive defeats at Anoeta in the competition since a run of four between 2013 and 2016.

programme.title: Manchester United vs Manchester City - English Premier League 2025/2026 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Manchester United lost the reverse fixture against Man City 3-0 in September. They last failed to score in both league meetings with the Citizens in 1973-74, a campaign that saw them relegated from the top-flight. Man City have won more Premier League away games against Man Utd than any other visiting side, while only Liverpool have scored more goals at Old Trafford than the Citizens.

programme.title: Chelsea vs Brentford - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Following their 3-0 win at the London Stadium in September, Tottenham are looking to complete the league double over West Ham for the first time since 2019-20. West Ham have won just one of their last eight league games against Spurs, beating them 2-1 at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium in December 2023.

programme.title: Liverpool vs Burnley - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Liverpool have lost just one of their nine Premier League home games against Burnley, though that defeat did come in January in the only previous season they faced them as reigning champions. Burnley have lost their last six Premier League games against Liverpool by an aggregate score of 12-1, since a 1-0 win at Anfield in January 2021.

programme.title: Nottingham Forest vs Arsenal - English Premier League 2025/2026 Week 22 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Nottingham Forest have lost eight of their last 10 Premier League games against Arsenal, though both exceptions have come at the City Ground since their return to the division in 2022. Arsenal have kept a clean sheet in each of their last three Premier League games against Nottingham Forest, their longest run of league shutouts against the Tricky Trees.

programme.title: PSG vs Lille - French Ligue 1 2025/2026 Week 18
programme.desc: Paris SG have conceded at least one goal in each of their last 11 matches against Lille in all competitions, with their last clean sheet coming in March 2021 in the Coupe de France. Paris SG have won 10 of their last 11 home matches against Lille in all competitions, the only exception being a defeat in April 2021 in Ligue 1.

programme.title: Kairat Almaty vs Club Brugge - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: This will be the first meeting between Kairat and Club Brugge – indeed, it will be the first major European match ever played between sides from Kazakhstan and Belgium. Only one non-qualifying European fixture has ever been played between teams from Kazakhstan and Belgium, with Tobol Kostanay beating K. Sint-Truidense VV 3-0 over two legs in the UEFA Intertoto Cup in 2003.

programme.desc: Real Madrid and Monaco’s only previous meetings came in the quarter-finals of the 2003-04 UEFA Champions League – after winning the first leg at home, the Spanish side were eliminated on the away goals rule following a 3-1 defeat in the reverse fixture. programme.title: Bodø/Glimt vs Manchester City - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Bodø/Glimt are winless in their six meetings with English sides in European competition, although did manage to avoid defeat in the only one to take place in the UEFA Champions League. This will be Manchester City’s first ever game against a Norwegian opponent. None of the last nine English sides to face a Norwegian team away from home in major European competition have lost, with Chelsea in October 2002 the last to lose there.

programme.title: Internazionale Milano vs Arsenal - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: Internazionale and Arsenal will meet for the fourth time in the UEFA Champions League – the Italians have won two of the previous three, including one over a Mikel Arteta-led Gunners side in last season’s league phase. Arsenal’s last victory away to an Italian side in the UEFA Champions League was in March 2008. Since then, they have failed to win on five straight trips, while failing to score a single goal.

programme.title: Real Madrid vs Monaco - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match

programme.title: Sporting Clube de Portugal vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7 - Mini Match
programme.desc: This is the first ever European meeting between Sporting CP and Paris SG – they will be the 12th different French side Sporting have faced overall in Europe, and first since they beat Marseille 2-1 on MD3 this season in the UEFA Champions League. Paris Saint-Germain have won just one of their eight away major European matches in Portugal, beating Sporting Braga 1-0 in the UEFA Cup in March 2009 with a Guillaume Hoarau goal.

Athletic Club vs Paris Saint-Germain - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD6

programme.title: Copenhagen vs Napoli - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Copenhagen will face Napoli for the first time in this match, while it will be the first UEFA Champions League fixture between sides from Denmark and Italy since the 2020-21 campaign, where Atalanta went unbeaten home and away versus FC Midtjylland. Napoli have won all four of their previous games against Danish opposition in European competition, beating B 1909 Odense twice in the 1966-67 Inter-Cities Fairs Cup and FC Midtjylland twice in the 2015-16 UEFA Europa League.

programme.title: Bayern München vs Union Saint-Gilloise - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: This is the first ever competitive meeting between Bayern Munich and Union Saint-Gilloise. Bayern have won eight of their nine home games against Belgian sides in all competitions, including a 4-0 win against Club Brugge already this season. Union Saint-Gilloise are unbeaten in all four of their away games against German sides in major European competition, most recently a 2-1 win at Eintracht Frankfurt in the 2023-24 UEFA Conference League.

programme.title: Villarreal vs Ajax - UEFA Champions League 2025/26 - MD7
programme.desc: Villarreal and Ajax have never faced before in any European competition – the Spaniards have won their last four against Dutch opponents, though this is their first meeting with a Dutch team since the 2010-11 UEFA Europa League quarter-final against FC Twente. Ajax have lost 12 of their last 15 UEFA Champions League matches against Spanish opponents but they have won their last two away from home, beating Real Madrid 4-1 in March 2019 and Valencia 3-0 in October 2019.

programme.title: Mallorca vs Athletic Club - Spanish LaLiga 2025/26 - Week 20
programme.desc: Real Club Deportivo Mallorca have not won any of their last seven LaLiga matches against Athletic Club and, should they fail to win this match, they will equal their longest ever winless run against the Basque team in the competition, which was between 1969 and 1988. Athletic Club have drawn eight of their 18 away games against Mallorca in LaLiga in the 21st century. They have only recorded more away draws against Getafe in the competition since then.

programme.title: Wrexham vs Leicester - EFL - English Football League SkyBet - Championship 2025/2026
programme.desc: Wrexham remain winless in seven Football League games against Leicester City, scoring just two goals in those meetings. Leicester last visited Wrexham in league competition in April 1982, drawing 0-0. They have never conceded a goal in three such trips.

programme.title: Montpellier vs Sant - Raphael - LNH Division 1 - French Handball Starligue
programme.desc: Dive into the excitement of French handball with Liqui Moly Starligue, formerly LNH Division 1. Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

Established in 1952, this premier league event features 16 top teams battling for glory. With Montpellier’s 14 Handball titles and Paris Saint-Germain's 11 wins, the competition is fierce. Champions earn spots in the EHF Champions League, while cup winners qualify for the European League.

programme.title: Al Shahania vs Um Salal - Qatar Stars League 2025/26 - W13
programme.desc: The Qatari League is the official football league in Qatar. The league includes 12 teams. The most famous participating clubs are Al-Sadd, the champions of the last season; Al-Rayyan and Al-Arabi, the popular teams, Al-Duhail and Al-Gharafa, serious contenders for the title every season. The Qatari league includes star names such as Firmino, Verratti, and Qatari Akram Afif, the best player in Asia.

Special Coverage AFCON Morocco 2025 Review
programme.desc: The 2025 Africa Cup of Nations, commonly known as AFCON 2025, marks the 35th edition of this prestigious biennial tournament organized by the Confederation of African Football (CAF). This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

This edition will be hosted by Morocco for the second time, following its previous hosting in 1988. Stay updated with comprehensive coverage of the AFCON Morcco 2025 on beIN Sports News.

programme.title: Football Legends - News
programme.desc: In the world of sports, few debates ignite passion and enthusiasm quite like the discussion surrounding the greatest football players of all time. This topic transcends generations, cultures, and nationalities, as fans passionately defend their favorites and recount unforgettable moments on the pitch. From legendary goal scorers to masterful playmakers, the players who have left an indelible mark on the game deserve recognition and celebration. " Football Legends" explore the remarkable careers and contributions of these iconic players who have shaped the beautiful game.
